IonoObservationAzimuth_Abridged.description: /// Multidimensional array of incoming azimuth at the receiver. Has the same dimensions as power. Antenna type, configuration, and method of determination to be documented in the azimuthNotes field.

notes.description:
Notes for the azimuth data.
Example: /// Example: NOTES
Constraints: Minimum length = 0, Maximum length = 512

dimensions.description:
Array of integers of the azimuth array dimensions.
Example: /// Example: [1, 2]
Constraints: No constraints specified.

dimensionName.description:
Array of names for dimensions.
Example: /// Example: ['NAME1', 'NAME2']
Constraints: No constraints specified.

data.description:
Array of incoming azimuth at the receiver.
Example: /// Example: [[[[[[[0.02, 0.034]]]]]]]
Constraints: No constraints specified.
